abstract.text: See how easy it is to migrate from a paid-up-front app to the Freemium model using FreemiumKit, while preserving access to your app for those who already purchased.

metadata.title: My app is paid-up-front. How can I make it Freemium?

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: Products not showing up in TestFlight builds?

abstract.text: Learn how to fix common issues when your in-app purchases or subscriptions don’t appear in TestFlight builds of your app.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: Can I use FreemiumKit for consumable products (like in-game currency / donations)?

abstract.text: Learn how FreemiumKit makes it easy to implement consumable in-app purchases for things like in-game currency, AI tokens, or donation/tip buttons.
The most frequently asked questions about FreemiumKit.
Learn how FreemiumKit allows you to mark purchases as ‘legacy’ and how the SDK ensures existing customers can continue to use your app as expected.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: How can I disable old products without customers losing access?

abstract.text: Simple In-App Purchases and Subscriptions for Apple Platforms:
Automation, Paywalls, A/B Testing, Live Notifications, PPP, and more.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: I use RevenueCat, how can I migrate?

abstract.text: See how easy it is to migrate from RevenueCat with our detailed migration guide – takes only ~30 minutes (including read time).

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: How does FreemiumKit handle User Privacy?

abstract.text: Learn how FreemiumKit was designed to keep your users data private and reduce the exposure of your purchase data to a minimum.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: My Mac app is crashing on start on TestFlight / during App Review – how to fix?

abstract.text: If your app crashes upon app start, it’s likely that your app can’t find the FreemiumKit SDK path. Learn how to fix your build settings.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: How does the Pricing work in detail?

abstract.text: Learn how we calculate your monthly income and what happens if you exceed your current plan.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: Is Apple Watch Supported as a Platform in FreemiumKit?

abstract.text: Yes, Apple Watch is supported in FreemiumKit with a small extra setup step. Learn more about what that step is and what limitations there are.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: How can I apply my custom server-side limits?

abstract.text: Learn how you can recognize a purchased user across app installs and devices to roll your own server-side logic for custom limits.
Learn how FreemiumKit deals with validation and how it helps you focus on what’s important – your app’s features!
Learn how to use our built-in parental gate for apps ‘Made for Kids’ to comply with Apples guidelines and avoid accidental purchases by small children.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: Are ‘Made for Kids’ apps supported with a Parental Gate?

abstract.text: Learn how to migrate from a paid-up-front app to the Freemium model using FreemiumKit in 3 simple steps, while preserving access to your app for those who already purchased.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: How does FreemiumKit work? Can I trust it?

abstract.text: Learn why you can trust FreemiumKit to scale with your app and why there’s no long-term lock-in risk for your app.
